comments.body: shouldn't this test be in a different class? same next 3 tests below

These tests involves both a serializer and a deserializer, so I think this is a better place to be in than `XXWindowedSerializer/DeserializerTest`. Actually I should bring `testWindowDeserializeExpectedWindowSize` to here as well.
See my comment about. Those classes are defined in `WindowedSerdes` and should be part of a `WindowedSerdesTest` class.
